thread.title: Nevada health officials hope fall break halts spread of norovirus in schools
thread.title_full: Nevada health officials hope fall break halts spread of norovirus in schools

title: Nevada health officials hope fall break halts spread of norovirus in schools
text:
Published By: Fox News: Health - Today 
Health officials are hoping a fall recess will help subdue a norovirus outbreak in Nevada schools that has grown at an alarming rate....
